programme.desc: Chutki elaborates on the detriments of child marriage, making Champaklal and Daya realise their mistakes. Sodhi prepares to party with his friends, much to the dismay of his wife, Roshan.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Roshan learns that Sodhi is drunk again, she refuses to take him back into their home. Chaos ensues as Sodhi tries to use several tricks to convince his wife to let him back in.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone in the society attempts to talk Sodhi out of jumping off the terrace after he threatens to do so.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone in Gokuldham Society celebrates Lohri together. Daya makes fun of Jethalal and his back pain.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Anticipating the Kite Festival, Tapu Sena is thrilled to see a variety of kites in the package Jethalal gets from Sundar and Daya.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society hold a special kite flying competition. Later, Sodhi and Jethalal get into a fight.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu impresses Bhide and Madhavi by helping them fix the computer. However, Bhide becomes hooked on using social media.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide and Madhavi are ecstatic after Bhide receives an email that claims he has won a jackpot of 1 crore, but he needs to transfer 50,000 rupees first.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After Bhide and Madhavi become rich, they scheme together about spending the money while keeping their relationships with the other residents the same.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide receives another email telling him to transfer 100,000 rupees in order to claim the jackpot, and he finds himself alone in the situation.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Since they cannot ask the residents for a loan, Bhide and Madhavi agree to pawn Madhavi's jewellery and use the money to claim the jackpot.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: As Bhide and Madhavi fantasise about what to do with the prize money, Popatlal warns the residents of a scam email that has been circulating.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide and Madhavi finally realise they have been tricked. A dangerous man visits the housing community.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: As Bhide tries to negotiate with the scammer, Abdul hears the conversation and brings all the residents to help Bhide.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents try to cheer Bhide up as he becomes disheartened after the incident. Later, the police inform them the IP address of the scammer has been found.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The police arrest the scammers, and the residents promise Bhide he will get his money back. Popatlal tells Tapu and his friends that a celebrity is coming to see them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu spends his holiday playing cricket in Gokuldham, which leads to property damage that causes everyone frustration.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to tone down Tapu's naughtiness, Jethalal decides to take him to his store. However, Tapu firmly refuses to accompany Jethalal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal finds himself in trouble as Tapu informs the police that Jethalal has hired him as a child labourer at his store. The police show up at Jethalal's store to interrogate him.
